tool_description: Checks real-time availability status of specified agents including current call status, schedule, and capacity.

agent_ids.description: Array of agent IDs to check availability for

include_scheduled.description: Whether to include agents scheduled to be available soon

max_queue_length.description: Maximum acceptable queue length for an agent

error_messages: Invalid agent ID: One or more agent IDs not found in system.
System unavailable: Agent status system temporarily unavailable.
Too many agents requested: Maximum 50 agents can be checked simultaneously.
Invalid timestamp: Timestamp must be current or recent (within last 5 minutes).
usage: Provide agent_ids and current_timestamp, optionally set include_scheduled and max_queue_length to check real-time agent availability.

available_agents.description: Agent IDs that are currently available

busy_agents.description: Agent IDs that are currently busy

offline_agents.description: Agent IDs that are currently offline

queue_lengths.description: Current queue length for each agent

estimated_availability.description: Estimated time when busy agents will become available
